com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking

Interface CheckAcceptenceStrategy.PatienceConfiguration

  • Enclosing class:
    CheckAcceptenceStrategy

    public static interface CheckAcceptenceStrategy.PatienceConfiguration
    The CheckAcceptenceStrategy.PatienceConfiguration defines the maximum time comparative checks are accepted and the time to recharge the maximum time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMaximumPatienceTime() 
      int getPatienceRechargeTime() 

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumPatienceTime

        int getMaximumPatienceTime()
        Returns:
        The maximum time comparative checks are accepted. Note: Also checks that last longer is accepted. The whole duration is subtracted from the patience balance. In this case, it takes duration times getPatienceRechargeTime() divided by getMaximumPatienceTime()

      • getPatienceRechargeTime

        int getPatienceRechargeTime()
        Returns:
        The time required to recharge an amount of getMaximumPatienceTime(). Note: the balance could be negative. It Could take more than the getPatienceRechargeTime() to recharge entirely.
